sensor_pages package

Contains code for interacting with each sensor.

Submodules

sensor_pages.battery_page module

Contains definition for BatterySensorPage class.

Bases: PageTemplate

! Display readings from LC709203F battery sensor / fuel gauge

! Reads battery voltage from file and returns line plot

! Makes plot on enter
